title: Chat adjustment
body:
Hey what's up

I've been playing League for a fair amount of time now and there has always been this one issue for me. 

In-game chat shows capital "i" and "1" as the same straight line.

There have been many many moments that I quickly peep at chat just to be confused for a second, reading an "I" for a "1". This isn't insanely game breaking but it is a small problem that can be easily fixed. The text from client chats differentiate between I and 1 very easily, even the board here has different viewings of 1 and I.

I'm open to feedback from anyone as well

Regards, Rexisea {{champion:17}}
